denizen_motivations: Seeketh redemption for sins most grievous
Hunteth for knowledge forbidden to mortals
Fleeth from pursuers terrible and relentless
Searcheth for kin lost to the darkness
Tradeth in human misery and woe
denizen_features: Covered in ritual scars that speak of dark rites
Missing several fingers to unknown horrors
Eyes clouded with cataracts from witnessing evil
Constantly muttering prayers to unhearing gods
Smelleth of decay and corruption most foul
Weareth tattered robes stained with time and sin
